Topic.Title: Making an object's name change after looking at it.

Posts.EditableText: I'm trying to make an object's name change from blob to swiss army knife after you look at it, is there a way to do that?
Posts.HTML: I'm trying to make an object's name change from blob to swiss army knife after you look at it, is there a way to do that?

Posts.EditableText: I'm doing a quest text adventure game
Posts.HTML: I'm doing a quest text adventure game

Posts.EditableText:
An object's `name` is how it is referred to in the code, so you should probably make it something useful like `swissarmyknife` even if the player doesn't know what it is yet. You use the object's `alias` to control what the player sees.

If you have a script for the object's `look`, you could include a line like:
```
this.alias = "swiss army knife"
```
to change the name that the player sees.

Posts.EditableText: ...I believe The Pixie recommends using a function to make the change ```SetAlias (this, "Swiss army knife")``` as that takes care of qualifiers such as "worn" for clothing.
